user_query: I'm interested in news articles from a specific source, BMJ, about COVID-19. Retrieve news articles related to COVID-19 from BMJ using the Covid news_v2 API. Also, provide me with the keyword trends for 'COVID-19' using the Targeted Keyword trend API.

TaskList.description: Retrieve news articles related to COVID-19 from the BMJ source using the Covid news_v2 API.
Retrieve keyword trends for 'COVID-19' using the Targeted Keyword trend API.
